mapper.select: SELECT d.development_group AS developmentGroup ,d.development_title AS developmentTitle ,d.development_case AS developmentCase ,d.development_day AS developmentDay ,k.kid_name AS kidName ,k.kid_gender AS kidGender ,t.teacher_name AS teacherName ,c.class_name AS className ,c.class_age AS classAge ,o.opserve_content AS opserveContent ,o.opserve_reference_1 AS opserveReference1 ,o.opserve_reference_2 AS opserveReference2 ,o.opserve_reference_3 AS opserveReference3 FROM development_details d INNER JOIN development dev ON dev.development_no = d.development_no INNER JOIN kid_formation kf ON kf.kid_formation_no = dev.kid_formation_no INNER JOIN kid k ON k.kid_no = kf.kid_no INNER JOIN teacher_formation tf ON tf.teacher_formation_no = dev.teacher_formation_no INNER JOIN teacher t ON t.teacher_no = tf.teacher_no INNER JOIN kid_class c ON c.class_no = kf.class_no INNER JOIN development_opserve o ON o.opserve_no = d.opserve_no WHERE detailes_no = #{detailesNo}
SELECT t.teacher_formation_no FROM teacher_formation t INNER JOIN kid_class k ON k.class_no = t.class_no WHERE class_year = #{classYear} AND t.teacher_no = #{teacherNo}
SELECT development_no AS developmentNo FROM development WHERE kid_formation_no = #{kidFormationNo}

SELECT k.kid_no AS kidNo ,k.kid_name AS kidName ,k.kid_birth AS kidBirth ,k.kid_gender AS kidGender ,c.class_name AS className ,c.class_age AS classAge ,f.kid_formation_no As kidFormationNo FROM kid k INNER JOIN kid_formation f ON f.kid_no = k.kid_no INNER JOIN kid_class c ON c.class_no = f.class_no WHERE f.kid_formation_no = ${kidFormationNo}

SELECT opserve_no AS opserveNo ,opserve_question_no AS opserveQuestionNo ,opserve_content AS opserveContent ,opserve_question AS opserveQuestion ,opserve_reference_1 AS opserveReference1 ,opserve_reference_2 AS opserveReference2 ,opserve_reference_3 AS opserveReference3 ,opserve_age AS opserveAge FROM development_opserve WHERE opserve_age = ${classAge}

select kid_attendance.attendance_no AS attendanceNo, kid_attendance.kid_no AS kidNo, kid_attendance.license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten, kid_attendance.attendance, kid_attendance.attendance_unusual AS attendanceUnusual, kid_attendance.attendance_day AS attendanceDay, kid_attendance_unusual.category_no AS categoryNo, kid_attendance_unusual.attendance_time AS attendanceTime, kid_attendance_unusual.attendance_memo AS attendanceMemo from kid_attendance left join kid_attendance_unusual on kid_attendance.attendance_no = kid_attendance_unusual.attendance_no where kid_attendance.attendance_day = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') and kid_attendance.kid_no = #{kidNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kid_attendance_unusual ( kid_no, attendance_no, category_no, attendance_time, attendance_memo, attendance_day ) VALUES ( #{kidNo}, #{attendanceNo}, #{categoryNo}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%T'), #{attendanceMemo}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') );
mapper.select: select attendance_no AS attendanceNo, kid_no AS kidNo, license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten, attendance, attendance_unusual AS attendanceUnusual, attendance_day AS attendanceDay from kid_attendance where kid_no = #{kidNo} and attendance_day = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: UPDATE kid_attendance SET attendance = #{attendance}, attendance_unusual = #{attendanceUnusual} WHERE kid_no = #{kidNo} and attendance_day = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kid_attendance ( kid_no, license_kindergarten, attendance, attendance_unusual, attendance_day ) VALUES ( #{kidNo}, #{licenseKindergarten}, #{attendance}, #{attendanceUnusual}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') )
mapper.select: select category_no AS categoryNo ,category_name AS categoryName from kid_attendance_category
select count(*) from kid_attendance where attendance_day = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') and license_kindergarten = #{license}
select license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten , class_no AS classNo , class_name AS className , class_year AS classYear , class_age AS classAge from kid_class where class_no = #{classNo}
select class_no AS classNo from teacher_formation where teacher_no = #{teacherNo}

SELECT license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten , kid_name AS kidName , kid_birth AS kidBirth , kid_address AS kidAddress , kid_protector_phone AS kidProtectorPhone , kid_protector_phone_reserve AS kidProtectorPhoneReserve , kid_precautions AS kidPrecautions , kid_gender AS kidGender , kid_commuting AS kidCommuting , kid_entrance_day AS KidEntranceDay FROM kid WHERE kid_no = #{kidNo}

SELECT class_no AS classNo , license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten , class_name AS className , class_year AS classYear , class_age AS classAge
FROM kid_class LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kid ( license_kindergarten, kid_name, kid_birth, kid_address, kid_protector_phone, kid_protector_phone_reserve, kid_precautions, kid_gender, kid_commuting, kid_entrance_day) VALUES ( #{licenseKindergarten}, #{kidName}, #{kidBirth}, #{kidAddress}, #{kidProtectorPhone}, #{kidProtectorPhoneReserve}, #{kidPrecautions}, #{kidGender}, #{kidCommuting}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') );
INSERT INTO kid_class ( license_kindergarten, class_name, class_year, class_age ) VALUES ( #{licenseKindergarten}, #{className}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y'), #{classAge} );
mapper.select: select kid.kid_no AS kidNo, kid.kid_name AS kidName, kid.kid_birth AS kidBirth , kid.kid_address AS kidAddress, kid.kid_protector_phone AS kidProtectorPhone, kid.kid_protector_phone_reserve AS kidProtectorPhoneReserve, kid.kid_precautions AS kidPrecautions, kid.kid_gender AS kidGender, kid.kid_commuting AS kidCommuting, kid.kid_entrance_day AS kidEntranceDay from teacher_formation inner join kid_formation inner join kid where teacher_formation.class_no = kid_formation.class_no and teacher_formation.license_kindergarten = kid_formation.license_kindergarten and kid_formation.kid_no = kid.kid_no and teacher_formation.license_kindergarten = #{license} and teacher_formation.teacher_no = #{teacherNo} LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}

SELECT kid.kid_no AS kidNo, kid.kid_name AS kidName, kid.kid_birth AS kidBirth , kid.kid_address AS kidAddress, kid.kid_protector_phone AS kidProtectorPhone, kid.kid_protector_phone_reserve AS kidProtectorPhoneReserve, kid.kid_precautions AS kidPrecautions, kid.kid_gender AS kidGender, kid.kid_commuting AS kidCommuting, kid.kid_entrance_day AS kidEntranceDay FROM kid where kid.license_kindergarten = #{license} LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}

SELECT license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten , kid_no AS kidNo , kid_name AS kidName , kid_birth AS kidBirth FROM kid WHERE kid_no NOT IN( select k.kid_no FROM kid_formation k INNER JOIN ( SELECT class_no FROM kid_class WHERE class_year =DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') ) c ON k.class_no = c.class_no) AND license_kindergarten = #{licenseKindergarten} AND DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') - DATE_FORMAT(kid_birth,'%Y') = #{classAge};

select kid.kid_name AS kidName ,kid.kid_no AS kidNo from kid left join kid_formation on kid.kid_no = kid_formation.kid_no where kid.license_kindergarten = #{licenseKindergarten} and kid_formation.class_no = #{classNo}
